title: Spider
description: Spider Command to Crawl the Site

entryPaths.description: Entry paths array to start crawling the app, it will be required more then one when there are pages not refenrenced from the app, like for instance ads

includePaths.description: Ensure these paths are included in the paths array

excludePaths.description: Excluded these paths from crawling, input data following glob patterns

excludeQuery.description: This flag tells Ampgular cli whether the queries have to be included in the crawed paths arrray

ensureCanonical.description: This flag ensures that only the pages/paths with a valid canonical definition will be added to the paths array

dryRun.description: This flag ensures that the crawling app results wontÂ´t overwrite the routes file for testing purposes.

verbose.description: When true, print out the exluded and discarded paths with additional files
